resources.string:
Skills Development Cell prime objective in KIT is to acquaint the students of our Institute with Industry. The Skills Development Cell organizes and extends services towards collaborative training activities. The cell conducts training activities for its students KSA (Knowledge; Skills and Aptitude) mainly focusing on Career Planning, Aptitude Development. Industry- Institute Interaction through: 

 On and Off - Campus Training 
Industrial Tours and Visits 
Seminars and Workshops 
Industrial Training 
Summer and Winter Internship 
Career Planning And Career Mapping 
Guest Lectures 
In House Training 
Free Internship Programs 

KIT, Kanpur is one of the very few colleges where the idea of establishing a specialised training cell has been implemented and proved successful. Skills Development Cell is sincerely working to empower students with various qualities and skills to achieve professional and personal excellence
